column5: finally getting to explore some of the opportunities out back in the ravine (picked up a quad). Never really fished for these guys, until I saw pods of big fatties casually hanging out in a back water while out for a ride Can of corn, eh? these things fight like a freight train -ugly as one too. Nice way wrap up a summers day when I was stuck at work.
Tuck that shirt in. LOL  New quad you say. I know many an ice angler that own them. Not giving up on ya bud. I know you can do it. LOL  Thats a piggie.

Tuck that shirt in. LOL - yeah - constant battle there these days......  New quad you say. I know many an ice angler that own them. Not giving up on ya bud. I know you can do it. LOL  reach for it bud........ ain't gonna happen  Thats a piggie.
Typical bloody englishman, next thing it will Bivvys, hair rigs.........

Say it ain't so Rick.  Don't judge me .. its the addiction, I can't help myself... see fish.... must try to catch........ Typical bloody englishman, next thing it will Bivvys, hair rigs......... hmm, gotta google that - the Welsh and Scots in me says,,,,,,,so long as it doesn't cost money, if it'll put fish on, we're in

You'll be like the guy I saw in Dunville last month before you know it. He had about 10K tied up in a trailer, various tents and sleeping arrangements and a rack of carp rods and hi tech bite alarms.  Good grief.
